title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.9 - Utility line installation in walls and ceilings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.9 - Utility line installation in walls and ceilings

State Regulations

Utility service lines and pipes shall not be
unnecessarily exposed on walls or ceilings in those areas listed in section
271-7.7
of this Subpart. Exposed
utility service lines and pipes shall be installed in a way that does not
obstruct or prevent cleaning of the walls and ceilings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.9

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
